title: Legacy skins not appearing
body:
Hey I'm trying to count up all my skins but half of them are not appearing due to them being legacy, tried to fix with multiple relogs but to no avail.
any tips are appreciated lol. (:

replies.body:
Hey Aunty Dolan,

If you're looking for an easy way to count up your skins, give the Elophant Client a try:
http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/champion-select
